title: Mhmohajeri
author: Mhmohajeri
content: Hello,I would like to inform you that I currently possess a standalone license for PAP (Post Affiliate Pro). However, please note that PAP no longer sells standalone licenses. I purchased this license in 2017, and it comes with one year of full support.The price for this license is 10,000 USD. If you require further information, please feel free to contact me at s.m.h.mohajeri@gmail.com.Thank you.
